com.esri.mo2.data.odb
Class LRUObjectCache

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.esri.mo2.data.odb.LRUObjectCache
public class LRUObjectCache
extends Object

This is a LRU object cache whose maximum size is not based on bytes but rather number of objects. The CacheListener's overflow method is called whenever LRUObjectCache.putObject results in an automatic removal of an object. It is up to the CacheListener to store this object persistently or whatever.
